title: cmd/go: go test gives sparse error message for _test files
body:
by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
If the file x_test.go contains an import statement with
an incorrect path "foo/bar", go test gives the sparse error message:

	imports foo/bar: package could not be found locally

For the same mistake in the file x.go, go test gives the error message:

	imports foo/bar: /path/.../x.go:39:8: package could not be found locally

Which revision are you using? 2f11c30b6ba6 tip
